001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.handling;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.log.LogUi;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.enums.WebElementAction;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.helper.FrameHelper;
006import org.openqa.selenium.By;
007import org.openqa.selenium.NoSuchElementException;
008import org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver;
009import org.openqa.selenium.WebElement;
010
011/**
012 * Provides exception handling functions for WebDriver actions.
013 *
014 * <p>This class includes utility methods to handle exceptions that may occur during
015 * WebDriver operations, such as handling {@link NoSuchElementException} when elements are not found.
016 * </p>
017 *
018 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
019 */
020public class ExceptionHandlingWebDriverFunctions {
021
022   private ExceptionHandlingWebDriverFunctions() {
023   }
024
025   /**
026    * Handles {@link NoSuchElementException} by attempting to locate the element within iFrames.
027    *
028    * <p>If an element is not found in the main DOM, this method will search within available iFrames.
029    * If found, the specified {@link WebElementAction} is performed.
030    * If the element is still not found, an error is logged and a {@link NoSuchElementException} is thrown.
031    * </p>
032    *
033    * @param driver           The WebDriver instance.
034    * @param webElementAction The WebElementAction to perform if the element is found.
035    * @param args             The arguments, where the first argument must be a {@link By} locator.
036    * @return The result of the performed action, if successful.
037    * @throws IllegalArgumentException If the locator argument is missing or invalid.
038    * @throws NoSuchElementException   If the element cannot be found in the main DOM or any iframe.
039    */
040   public static Object handleNoSuchElement(WebDriver driver, WebElementAction webElementAction, Object... args) {
041      if (args.length == 0 || !(args[0] instanceof By)) {
042         LogUi.error("Invalid or missing locator argument.");
043         throw new IllegalArgumentException("Action requires a By locator.");
044      }
045
046      By locator = (By) args[0];
047
048      if (webElementAction == WebElementAction.FIND_ELEMENTS) {
049         WebElement container = FrameHelper.findContainerIframe(driver, locator);
050         if (container != null) {
051            return webElementAction.performActionWebDriver(driver, locator);
052         }
053      } else {
054         WebElement foundElement = FrameHelper.findElementInIframes(driver, locator);
055         if (foundElement != null) {
056            return webElementAction.performActionWebDriver(driver, foundElement);
057         }
058      }
059      LogUi.error("Element(s) not found in the main DOM or any iframe.");
060      throw new NoSuchElementException("Element(s) not found in main DOM or any iframe.");
061   }
062}
